title: Ensure users can report security concerns in Teams
description: Enabling reporting of security concerns allows users to report suspicious messages in Microsoft Teams, which can then be analyzed by Microsoft Defender for Office 365.
rationale: User-reported messages provide valuable signals for identifying phishing and other malicious content.
impact: Users will have the option to report Teams messages, enhancing the organisationâ€™s threat visibility.
remediation:
1. Go to Microsoft Defender portal > Email & collaboration > Policies & rules > Threat policies.
2. Select User reported settings.
3. Under Microsoft Teams, toggle 'Let users report security issues in Teams' to On.
4. Save the configuration.
audit_ui:
Microsoft Defender portal > Email & collaboration > Policies & rules > Threat policies > User reported settings
Verify Teams reporting toggle is enabled.
